5. anumānasuttaṃ
Anumānasuttaṁ
Evamme sutaṁ ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhaggesu viharati suṁsumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye. Tatra kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi āvuso bhikkhavoti. Āvusoti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosuṁ.
Āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca pavāreti cepi āvuso bhikkhu vadantu maṁ āyasmanto vacanīyomhi āyasmantehīti so ca hoti dubbaco dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgato akkhamo appadakkhiṇaggāhī anusāsaniṁ atha kho Ma. Yu. naṁ. sabrahmacārī na ceva vattabbaṁ maññanti na ca anusāsitabbaṁ maññanti na ca tasmiṁ puggale vissāsaṁ āpajjitabbaṁ maññanti. Katame cāvuso dovacassakaraṇā dhammā. Idhāvuso bhikkhu pāpiccho hoti pāpikānaṁ icchānaṁ vasaṅgato yampāvuso bhikkhu pāpiccho hoti pāpikānaṁ icchānaṁ vasaṅgato ayampi dhammo dovacassakaraṇo.
